channel.title: $$ Prestigescape 728 PHP & JavaScript Coders Needed.! Urgent Paying! $$
channel.description:
Hi, I need a few expert coders to help me with my server we currently do have a few coders but, they dont know PHP I need coders who know PHP and Java Script to an extent they know how to make a online shop for my forums. I also need someone who can help me set up my online shop (SMS Gateway and paypal)
Of course ill be paying and hopefully you can stay as a member in the Development team, once on forums you will receive your own crown, personalized or default, and at the end a pay.
What we have for our server... VPS: 6GB 2.0GHz Six Core AMD 100GB
And we have a separate WEBHOST for forums + Vbulletin 4.2 (Paid For with licence) I am going to pay $$ and also prices vary on how good of a job you do.
I Will give you an example and i want you to code the same thing for me Using Javascript and PHP.
Name/Nickname: Age: Why would you like to join this project: How would you to contribute to this project: Position wanted: Anything else you want me to know: Skype: Msn:
[font=verdana, helvetica, sans-serif]If you do not have skype... make one its easier to communicate as all my coders have it and so do i.[/font] [font=verdana, helvetica, sans-serif]Message Me ASAP.[/font] [font=verdana, helvetica, sans-serif]Thank You For Your Time :)[/font]

item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:3, topic:507745”]You can’t offer any kind of payment for work on this website, if you had read the rules you would have realised this. I’ve forwarded the link to a member of staff who has power in here to lock the thread.

It’d be wise to familiarize yourself with these rules before posting again.[/quote]
This
